item.description:
This event was rescheduled to Saturday 10/4/08 due to heavy rains on the original date.

Join us for a fun day of apple picking at Berlin Orchards. There is a short hayride (free) to the apple orchards, gourmet food shop with fresh baked pies, cider donuts and they also have a pumpkin patch. We will meet up at Berlin Orchards... the hayride area.

Saturday @ 2pm
October 4, 2008
Berlin Orchards
Rt 62 and Lower Sawyer Hill Road
Berlin, MA 01503


website: www.berlinorchards.com

$15 - a peck (10 lbs) (can be shared with another person)
$25 - 1/2 a bushel (20 lbs)

Free parking, no entrance fee

Transportation is your own responsibility. However, we will try to arrange carpools for you if possible. When you RSVP - please indicate whether you need a ride or not and what town or city you are coming from.

If you can provide a carpool, please let me know where you are
coming from. This will help us to coordinate the carpools as best as we can.

Berlin Orchards is about 40 miles from Boston.

Drive Directions:
Please visit this site http://www.berlinorch...

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Apple Picking
